item.description: arXiv:2510.11905v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: For Large Language Models (LLMs) to be reliable, they must learn robust knowledge that can be generally applied in diverse settings -- often unlike those seen during training. item.description: arXiv:2510.11967v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Large language model (LLM) agents are fundamentally constrained by context length on long-horizon tasks.
